author: Jamie Crawley
title: A South Korean Biotech Firms Gets $183.3M Funding to Build Bitcoin Treasury
description: The company is also preparing to list on public markets in the U.S. via a special purpose acquisition company, SilverBox Corp IV.
content:
Bridge Biotherapeutics (288330), a South Korean biotech company, may be looking to become the country's answer to Strategy (MSTR) or Metaplanet (3350) by adopting a bitcoin treasury strategy.
